name: Freetown Amuesment Park
description: A lush green national park beaming with wildlife and scenic views, perfect for hiking and nature walks.

name: Cotton Tree
description: A historical landmark in the heart of Freetown, symbolizing unity and culture among the people.

name: Jumbo Beach
description: A popular beach destination known for its white sands and vibrant atmosphere, perfect for relaxation and water sports.

name: Prince of Walse School
description: A historic school with a rich legacy, widely regarded as the best in the country, known for its academic excellence and contribution to education in Sierra Leone.

name: Lumley Beach
description: A vibrant beach community known for its lively restaurants and stunning sunsets, a great spot for social gatherings.

name: Freetown Museum
description: A small museum showcasing the rich history and culture of Sierra Leone, including artifacts and exhibitions.

name: St. John's Maroon Church
description: A historic church notable for its architecture and important role in the religious community of Freetown.

name: Aberdeen Memorial
description: A memorial site commemorating the fallen heroes of Sierra Leone, a place for reflection and remembrance.
